replies.body: Does the rotating gamemodes contribute towards ocean week?
Yep! Any match-made game against human players counts. Infact, today, it'll count for 2 points, because it's on Summoner's Rift, which is the current active bonus map!
Anyone wanna form a group/club for the event?

You should check out the [Volunteer's thread around Ocean Week ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-events/U5Bjv4Tz-volunteer-ocean-week-2017)- they're working to get a group going around Ocean Week including a discord chat to find other players to play with
yeah I sent a friend req
All Matchmade games count, including ARAM games! Infact, on Monday 30th and Tuesday 31st you'll get double points for games on Howling Abyss!

Looks like you had some games during the time period on Friday morning where we had an issue.  We've been able to fix up that issue for almost all the impacted people, but it looks like the games from that morning (3 of them) still haven't come through correctly for you. We're still tracking down the issue that caused that to happen for these accounts, but we're working on a solution. 

The other games that have happened since then seem to be coming through for your account correctly. I'll let you know when we've got an update for the earlier games!
I am still perplexed why my games won't even register. Anyone else have similar issues?

Looks like you had played some games during the first few hours of Friday morning. We had an issue early on Friday with games for some players not giving out points correctly. We've since made adjustments to make those points count - and from a quick look at your account, it seems that you have the right number of points now compared to your match history.

Let me know if it still looks off!

I enlisted before the 26th, I believe it was around the 20th I enlisted for ocean week and I have yet to recieve the IP boost and my wins don't seem to be counting towards the Ocean week points, it says I have contributed 0.

From what I can see, you had a bunch of games during the time period that we had some problems early yesterday morning - we've sinced fixed that problem and the players that were effected.

I'm seeing you with 7 points currently - and that looks like the right amount judging from your match history - let me know if you're still having problems (or if you didn't end up having the IP boost!)
